required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Validation of Ultra Sound (US) Elastography for the Evaluation of Soft Tissue and Organ Lesions

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, single-center, non-randomised, non-blinded trial with US Elastography of Patients referred to our institution to assess soft tissue and organ lesions. All patients will undergo next to the clinical indicated conventional US-examination, US Elastography after informed consent. After completion of these three examinations, the participation in the study is completed.

detailed_description.textblock:
The investigators propose UltraSound Elastography as an imaging method which allows for a better evaluation of soft tissue and organ lesions compared to the conventional US modalities used nowadays in the dayly clinical routine.
This is a prospective, single-center, non-randomised, non-blinded trial with US Elastography of Patients referred to our institution to assess soft tissue and organ lesions. All patients will undergo next to the clinical indicated conventional US-examination, US Elastography after informed consent. After completion of these three examinations, the participation in the study is completed.

primary_outcome.description: Value of US Elastography compared to conventional US

secondary_outcome.description: Value of US Elastography compared to conventional US

arm_group.description: All patients will undergo next to the clinical indicated conventional US-examination, US Elastography after informed consent. After completion of these three examinations, the participation in the study is completed.

intervention.description: Ultrasound Elastography of soft tissue and organ lesions

study_pop.textblock: Patient scheduled for clinically indicated conventional Ultrasound examination

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient scheduled for clinically indicated conventional Ultrasound examination
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age < 18 years

overall_official.affiliation: University Hospital Zurich, Institue of Diagnostic Radiology

link.description: Elastography in pancreatic solid tumours diagnoses.
